title: Pure Rapture
description: Their love is outlawed by both their Kinds…  Tal-Telal, the legendary General who led the Pure Ones to freedom, paid the ultimate price for his people: breaking the heart of his one True Love.  Her shattered heart continues to yearn…  Ishtar Anshar, once royalty reigning over a vast, ancient empire, lost everything she held dear. Deceived by those she trusted the most, she blamed the one male who sacrificed all to protect her.  No matter the distance and time, love is a renegade that cannot be ruled…  Now Fate has reunited them in this modern time to combat a burgeoning threat. Can they put the darkness behind them and forge a brighter future together?
author: Aja James
